constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 197 (Friday, November 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JACKSON:
H.R. 5955.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H6247]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations.

title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit to Congress reports on the pilot program on acceptance by the Department of Veterans Affairs of donated facilities and related improvements.
